# Pass Without Trace (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 2]], [[1st Level Druid Spells|Druid 1]], [[1st Level Elven Archer Spells|Elven archer 1]], [[1st Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Touch

**Targets:** One creature/level touched

**Duration:** 1 hour/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 318

The subject or subjects of this spell do not leave footprints or a scent trail while moving. Tracking the subjects is impossible by nonmagical means.

**GM Note** 

*House Rule:* Added Assassin 2 to Level per *Dungeon Master's Guide*.

                       Added Elven archer 1 to Level per New Paths Compendium (Kobold Press), pg. 20.
